roleset.name: publish

example.name: All Arguments
example.text: Avatar Press is most notable for their publishing of "Bad Girl" comics such as Pandora, who is considered by many to be their flagship character.
example.arg: of "Bad Girl" comics such as Pandora, who is considered by many to be their flagship character.
